body_html:
Dear Andrew: Thanks so much for your kindly reply. I think the build file used for building nccl you mentioned should be this one: "/home/hpc-xin/.cache/bazel/_bazel_hpc-xin/c5e302e32d7acb9c3e4fce8142d1cd66/external/nccl_archive/BUILD". Actually, i spend sometime to checked this file yesterday, however, i have no idea about how to change it. Could you help me figure out how to change it? BTW, the compiling error shows that "this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'external/nccl_archive/src/ libwrap.cu.cc':" and all of related files are listed afterwards. However, i check all of those files one by one, and all of them are exactly existed. Thanks so much for your help. Best regards Xin 2017-06-13 4:27 GMT-04:00 Andrew Selle <notifications@github.com>:
…
Could you try to solve it like others have just to make sure you have everything working otherwise. Then put it back. Basically, it looks like you need to change the build file used for building nccl. @gunan <https://github.com/gunan>, do you have any ideas? — You are receiving this because you authored the thread. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#10665 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AKirbU2uZqbxGq8lQSKSVZ_MG32hd_dgks5sDkfbgaJpZM4N37-3> .
body_text:
Dear Andrew:

Thanks so much for your kindly reply. I think the build file used for
building nccl you mentioned should be this one:
"/home/hpc-xin/.cache/bazel/_bazel_hpc-xin/c5e302e32d7acb9c3e4fce8142d1cd66/external/nccl_archive/BUILD".


Actually, i spend sometime to checked this file yesterday, however, i have
no idea about how to change it. Could you help me figure out how to change
it?

BTW, the compiling error shows that "this rule is missing dependency
declarations for the following files included by 'external/nccl_archive/src/
libwrap.cu.cc':" and all of related files are listed afterwards. However, i
check all of those files one by one, and all of them are exactly existed.

Thanks so much for your help.
Best regards
Xin

body:
Dear Andrew:

Thanks so much for your kindly reply. I think the build file used for
building nccl you mentioned should be this one:
"/home/hpc-xin/.cache/bazel/_bazel_hpc-xin/c5e302e32d7acb9c3e4fce8142d1cd66/external/nccl_archive/BUILD".


Actually, i spend sometime to checked this file yesterday, however, i have
no idea about how to change it. Could you help me figure out how to change
it?

BTW, the compiling error shows that "this rule is missing dependency
declarations for the following files included by 'external/nccl_archive/src/
libwrap.cu.cc':" and all of related files are listed afterwards. However, i
check all of those files one by one, and all of them are exactly existed.

Thanks so much for your help.
Best regards
Xin
